basic.blooming: Foliage plants, viewing period year around

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, grows in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, yellowing and diseased leaves timely
